greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Numbers k such that k^k + k + 1 is prime.
comment: There is no further term up to 10000. - _Farideh Firoozbakht_, Nov 11 2006
mathematica: Do[ If[ PrimeQ[ n^n + n + 1], Print[n]], {n, 1, 700} ]
results.author: _Felice Russo_, Jan 10 2001
